docs.summary: Currencies that can be used to display prices in your store.
description: You can display prices in your Wix store in different currencies. Use the Currency objects and the [currency conversion dropdown element](https://support.wix.com/en/article/adding-and-setting-up-a-currency-converter-in-wix-stores) on your store page to display prices in a range of different currencies. Show exchange rates and convert between currencies using rates provided by [XE](https://www.xe.com/company/). These rates are updated on a daily basis and include the timestamp when they were set.

docs.summary: Gets conversion rates and converts amounts.
description: Use the currency converter to get currency conversion rates for any pair of supported currencies.
The exchange rates are provided by [XE](https://www.xe.com/company/) on a daily basis and include the timestamp when they were set.
You can also convert an array of amounts from one currency to another.

docs.summary: Gets and sets currencies that you want to support on your site.
description: You can set the currencies that you want your site to support.
The currency codes used must exist in the array returned by the [`getAllCurrencies()`](#currencies.getAllCurrencies) function.

notes:
To use the SiteSettings functions, your site must contain a store page including the [currency conversion element](https://support.wix.com/en/article/adding-and-setting-up-a-currency-converter-in-wix-stores).
You can hide or collapse the currency conversion element if you do not want it to display.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - The list of all supported currencies.

docs.summary: Gets the list of all supported currencies that can be used for payments.
description: The `getAllCurrencies()` function returns a Promise that resolves to an array of currencies.
The array lists all of the supported currency codes and their symbols that can be used for payments on Wix sites.

notes:
This function is different from [`siteSetting.getCurrencies()`](#siteSettings.getCurrencies) in that this function gets the complete list of all of the currencies that can be supported on Wix sites. 
The [`siteSetting.getCurrencies()`](#siteSettings.getCurrencies) function gets only the currencies that have been set for use in this site using the backend function [`siteSetting.setCurrencies()`](wix-pay-backend.Currencies.html#sitesettings.setcurrencies).

The currency converter changes the displayed prices in your store for different currencies but does not affect the payment currency. The payment is always made in the [currency set in the dashboard](https://support.wix.com/en/article/setting-your-currency-for-accepting-payments).
By using this object you agree to XE's [Terms of Use.](https://www.xe.com/en/legal/dfs.php)
